headline: PJM selects regional transmission projects to be jointly developed by Dominion Energy, American Electric Power, FirstEnergy
summary: RICHMOND, Va., February 27, 2025--Regional grid operator PJM Interconnection has selected several electric transmission projects that will be jointly developed by Dominion Energy, American Electric Power Company through its Transource Energy affiliate and FirstEnergy Transmission, LLC across multiple states within the PJM footprint.
